topic_text: Writing a weather guide for your city
passage: I live in the South of Viet Nam. In this place,we have two season, the rain and the dry season. In the rain season, is usually cool and rain a lot so i have to wear rain coat in this season. Is very hot in the dry season, i like to go out with friends and play tennis.
query_sentence: Is very hot in the dry season , i like to go out with friends and play tennis .

passage: I'm a student. I like my job because i can study lots of good things,  play with lots of friend. Sometimes it's tired, i have to study all day but sometimes exciting when i get good marks. The teachers always advise me,  help me to do exercise. I like my job!
query_sentence: Sometimes it 's tired , i have to study all day but sometimes exciting when i get good marks .

passage: Name: Viet Huynh. Age: 12. Birthday: 05/01. Like doing: play soccer and chess, listening to music and shopping! Lives in: Ho Chi Minh city, Viet Nam. Favorite: Season: spring. Color: big blue. Time: afternoon. Day: Sunday. Number: 84.
query_sentence: Lives in : Ho Chi Minh city , Viet Nam .

passage: Well, it's my birthday on next Sunday. I would like to invite you to my birthday party. Time: 13 pm Thursday, May 6 Address: Sheraton Hotel, No. # Dong Khoi Street, District 1, HCMC. Food: soup, chicken sandwiches, bread, a big cake and some apples Drinks: wine, juice, coca cola. Music: dance music. Invites. Best regards Vinh Bui Van Note: Thank you for helping me in learning English.%%

There was a theft in my district last week. Thieves broke into an Italian restaurant on Saturday evening. The owner reported that the thieves did not take anything except 2 bottles of Coke. Everyone thought that it was strange. Two days later, the owner remembered that he himself broke in and took them when he was drunk. It was really funny.
query_sentence: Thieves broke into an Italian restaurant on Saturday evening .

passage: Barcelona is one of my favorite cities. Is on the coaste of Mediterranean Sea, in the north east of Spain. Distance from Moscow to Barcelona is about 3700 km. Barcelona ?are three or four nice beaches and the port. On the opposite side of the city there is a mountain Tibidabo. There is a zoo and lovely parks.I love the Park Guell and Gaudi buildings. People in Barcelona are very beautiful. Even tourists. Barcelona makes people are happy. I can write about this city for a long time.
query_sentence: Is on the coaste of Mediterranean Sea , in the north east of Spain .
